about_the_game:
Return to a ruined world of pollution and exploitation, and correct the mistakes of the past.

This world is filled with Dokis, little robots with a big job, to cleanse the world of its toxicity and stabilise the ecosystem. You’ve taken on the task to help them, because there are somethings little Dokis can’t fix.
Discover the hidden past of this world, the origin of the Dokis, the source of the corruption, and the shape of the world!

Collect Dokis to form the perfect corruption-fighting team!
Explore a wide world and venture to its edges!
Leave this place better than you found it!



Turn-Based Battles:
Master the art of strategic combat. Command your Dokis with precision, utilizing their unique abilities to overcome challenges. Your decisions will shape your path.

Doki Capture:
Battles aren't just about winning; they're also about building a powerful team. Grow your roster with diverse Dokis, each with its own strengths. With a total of 70 Dokis to capture, assemble a formidable team.

Defeat Other Trainers:
Compete against fellow trainers on your path to healing the planet. Will you rise as the top Doki battler in this new world? Face off against others, capture Dokis, and become a formidable force.

Forge bonds with your Dokis, adapt your strategies, and prepare for epic battles as you work towards restoring balance and defeating the corporations in Dokis World.



Prepare to immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic world unlike any other.
The year is 4096, and our planet is struggling under the weight of environmental devastation caused by ruthless corporations. The very essence of nature is under threat, and it's up to you, with the assistance of the loyal Dokis, to heal what remains.

You'll set out on a mission to confront nefarious corporations and restore balance to the world. Navigate through the ruins of once-thriving cities, bearing witness to the destructive legacy of greed and neglect.

Along the way, encounter a cast of diverse characters, each with their own stories, motives, and unique abilities. The Dokis will aid you in your quest to heal the planet, their technology and unwavering dedication serving as a powerful weapon against the corporate forces.

But where did your Doki come from?
Who made them, and when? Discover the hidden past of the Doki, and uncover the cause of their corruption.

The choices you make will shape the outcome of this epic adventure. Will you be the catalyst for change and restore harmony to the world, or will the corporations continue to corrupt and destroy?

Prepare to embark on a gripping journey filled with twists, challenges, and moral dilemmas as you strive to mend the very fabric of our wounded planet. The fate of our world rests in your hands.



In Dokis World, we invite you to explore a vast and vibrant environment that seamlessly blends the grandeur of nature with the awe-inspiring presence of technology.
Explore vast plains, sunny beaches, dense forests, treacherous mountains, and awe-inspiring futuristic cities.

Embark on a journey through the landscape of Dokis World, where exploration is rewarded, secrets hide around every corner, and adventure awaits with every step. Discover the unique interplay between nature and technology as you embark on a mission to heal our planet with the help of the Dokis.

Immerse yourself in a vast, vibrant world, and get ready for a gaming experience like no other!



We're excited to introduce Dokis World, a thrilling land of nature and technology in an open setting like no other.
We invite you on a journey where strategic turn-based battles await, in a world where Dokis, small robots dedicated to healing our planet from climate change, are your allies.

Our passion for the environment comes together with our experience of gaming, where every detail is a testament to our commitment.
We can't wait to share more about Dokis World as the release date approaches. Join us in this exciting and sustainable adventure!

Best regards

Dev Team

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 / Manjaro 18
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i3-3330
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 / 1 GB VRAM / Shader Model 5.0 or higher graphics card is required
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS @ 1280x720
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / Manjaro 21
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 370 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / 2 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS @ 1920x1080

name: Kukus World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bits
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i3-3330
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 260X / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 / 1 GB VRAM / Shader Model 5.0 or higher graphics card is required
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS @ 1280x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bits
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 370 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS @ 1920x1080

esrb.descriptors: Role-playing game which involves catching, training and fighting Robots.
esrb.interactive_elements: Users Interact (PC, Switch, Xbox Series, PlayStation 5)
